entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain mixed with light snow in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
